summary: Two young women find their friendship strained when one wins a role in a Broadway show, and the other's boyfriend begins to fall for her.
cast: Marion Davies|Robert Montgomery|Billie Dove|Jimmy Durante|James Gleason|Zasu Pitts|Sidney Toler|Douglass Dumbrille|Sarah Padden|Louise Carter|Clyde Cook|Rocky Twins|Oscar Apfel|Max Barwyn|George Bookasta|George Cooper|John Davidson|Dorothy Dixon|Harry Dixon|George Dunning|Jay Eaton|Bud Geary|Billy Gilbert|Edmund Goulding|Sherry Hall|Wilbur Mack|Harold Miller|Bert Moorhouse|Edmund Mortimer|Lee Phelps|Ronald R. Rondell|C. Montague Shaw|Larry Steers|Robert Strange|Charles Williams|Harry Wilson
title: La rubia del Follies
